item.title: Provisioning Azure Automation Webhooks via ARM Templates

item.title: About
item.description: I’m a Software Engineer based in Sydney, Australia. I graduated in 2015 from Western Sydney University with a Bachelor of Computer Science and have since been working in the cloud infrastructure space. I’m particularly interested in distributed systems and infrastructure automation (yeah, I’m a shameless Kubernetes fanboy). In between coding sessions, you can find me nerding out about football (NFL/NRL), music, and whatever else has grabbed my attention at that given moment.
